"},{"text":"Arborenda Shamir","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Arborenda boosts a single swing to be able to knock down an entire tree."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.arborenda_shamir.1"}]}]

sections.name: page_1
pages: ["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"The Arborenda Shamir is found on Barium Bands. It can be placed onto axes.\n\nWhen mining a log, the entire tree will also break, taking up durability of the axe for each log broken."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.arborenda_shamir.2"}]}]
